title: Introduction to C Programming
description: Learn the fundamentals of the C programming language with this comprehensive course. Understand the principles of C programming, including variables, data types, control structures, and more. Get hands-on experience through coding exercises and projects.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
description: Explore the world of algorithms and problem-solving. This course covers algorithmic techniques, data structures, and algorithm analysis. Gain insights into efficient algorithms and their applications.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
description: Master the C++ programming language for data structures and algorithms. Learn about classes, objects, templates, and their applications in solving complex problems. Build strong coding skills.

title: Basic Data Structures
description: Dive into fundamental data structures like arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues. Understand their implementation and when to use them in real-world programming scenarios.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
description: Explore object-oriented programming (OOP) with Python. Learn about classes, inheritance, polymorphism, and encapsulation. Apply OOP principles to create robust Python applications.

title: Software Engineering
description: Gain insights into the world of software engineering. Learn about software development methodologies, project management, and best practices for building high-quality software.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
description: Discover the power of AWS and cloud computing. Get hands-on experience with cloud services, deployment, and scaling. Learn how to build and manage applications in the cloud.

title: Database (MySQL)
description: Learn the fundamentals of database management with MySQL. Understand database design, SQL queries, and data manipulation. Build and maintain databases for your applications.

title: Problem-Solving Part
description: Enhance your problem-solving skills with this course. Practice solving coding challenges, algorithmic problems, and logical puzzles. Sharpen your analytical thinking.
